StringProperty.Name: DisplayNamePum
StringProperty.Description: Overrides the default ebug display name of the model.

EnumProperty.Name: RecalcNormalsPum
EnumProperty.Description: Forces the use of face normals in the output model and recalculates them if they are already defined.

EnumProperty.Name: RecalcTangentsPum
EnumProperty.Description: Forces the use of tangents in the output model and recalculates them if they are already defined.

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalTexturesPum
StringListProperty.Description: Includes the specified textures in the output file (used for missing textures).
